name: Park Suite King

name: Diplomat Suite
description: This lavish and elegant suite offers 228 square meter space, equipped with one king bed, a living room, a private gym, a kitchen, a work desk made from solid Trembesi wood, and a dining table.

name: Presidential Suite
description: This supremely luxurious suite boasts 300 square meters and floor-to-ceiling windows complete with one bedroom, a living area, a workspace, a rainfall shower, and deep-soaking tub, and a dining area. Expect to be indulged in the gourmet minibar, wet bar, additional half bath, and private VIP entrance.
